ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to go to Kelethin. People in Kelethin are friendlier. Heh. looking like PP is funny. :-) That reminds me, isn t the game supposed to ask you if you
ygData.messageBody:
You have to go to Kelethin. People in Kelethin are friendlier. Heh. looking
like PP is funny. :-)
That reminds me, isn't the game supposed to ask you if you want to drop your
money when you are clicking it over something? Bc I tried to trade money
with someone once and it didn't trade but the money was gone. The person
informed me that I had dropped it on the ground. I had not meant to drop it
and it didn't ask me if I wanted to.. Was that a glitch?
luv,
-Su

> I've done that for fun but never got any money doing it. I've spent too
much
> time in the EC tunnel looking like some dropped PP on the ground. People
> would try to pick me up and would be like ohhh, it's not real.
>
> Lena
>
> > Go around and turn yourself into different objects in front of people
and
> > try to make funny comments. Sometimes amusing people will get you money.
but
> > do it for fun, not just for money.
> > luv,
> > -Su
>
>
>
>
>
>
